Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
Every moment is a fresh beginning. – T.S Eliot
Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life.
We do not remember days, we remember moments.
Die with memories, not dreams.
Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
What we think, we become. – Buddha
Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
Life is sweeter than sugar but at the same time it is as sour as a lemon.
Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life.
Life isn’t about how many breaths you take but about the moments that take your breathe away.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
People change, love hurts, friends leave, things go wrong but just remember that life goes on.
Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
Life isn’t worth living for, unless you have something worth dying for.
We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
Life was always a matter of waiting for the right moment to act.
Relax! Life is beautiful!
Life is all about having a good time.
Life is a game and true love is a trophy.
Remember your yesterdays, dream your tomorrows and live your today.
Without music, life would be a mistake.
Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.
The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
I think the most important thing is to be in a good mood and enjoy life, wherever you are.
Our life is what our thoughts make it.
Life is the most wonderful thing that we receive from God.

Life treats me like the dumb wife who never gets a choice.
